tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ***** ** ** *********  ****** *** *** * ****** ***.  My full family are his patients. My husband has done his 2 implants with him and is very Happy. My son has filled his cavities and now is a regular patient with Manoj. He visits him religiously every 3 months and gets his dental cleaning done. I was the last person to visit him . But last and best is the treatment I got from him.  He solved my problem and gave me a painless tooth in minutes without using a needle.  He was referred to us by my neighbour Mrs Medha Nadkani. His reference was given to us by my old Dentist Dr Sonal Shetty.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went with a lot of complications - a couple of milk teeth chipping off (Yes, you head right! I have around 4 of them still and they are causing all round trouble), worn out old fillings, potential root canal treatment, tooth extraction and bridge...the works. 

I like how all the problems were thoroughly scrutinized and sorted to arrive at a logical treatment plan. I was kept in the loop at all times. Also, treatment was avoided, where not necessary. For example, where a tooth could be saved via filling with some trial and error as against doing a root canal. I don't know too many dentists who would do that as a root canal is always more expensive.

 I like the cheery, bright ambience of the clinic, too.

 I would highly recommend Dr. Manoj Bodhwani's clinic. It has reduced my deep fear of dental treatment considerably.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Highly Recommend you guys to go and visit him once before you take any decision. I got my root canal done with Another dentist, but I did not put the cap to it. it was Paining inspite of him filling t twice. so I got my CBCT scan done which showed there's a Fracture. I am extremely scared as almost 5 prosthodontist told me we need to Remove 2 tooth as the other one is milk tooth. but somehow I was not convinced with them so I found DR. Manoj on Google and I visited him. He told me There's no Fracture as the Report says that, " There Possibly a Fracture"and guess what? there's actually no crack in the Tooth It was a badly Done rootcanal previously which was leading to constant pain Guys I swear I went to These Juhu ke Expensive prosthodontist all are trying to sell Tooth Implant but Dr. Manoj is the saved my 2 Tooth ü¶∑ I am extremely thankful and grateful to him üôèüèª‚ù§Ô∏è
